blogPost.excerpt: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.
blogPost.body: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.
blogPost.title: Mindfulmeets (for Google Meet) - Add emojis/GIFs, agendas, guest info & more to Google Meet
blogPost.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: 精心设计的视频会议增强功能，可提高工作效率和数字福利。议程显示，客人信息，优雅的进入/退出，表情符号和GIF分享，具有鼓舞人心和有趣的界面。
localize.tagline: 向Google Meet添加表情符号/GIF、议程、客人信息等

localize.description: 精心設計的視頻會議增強功能，可提高工作效率和數字福利。議程顯示，客人信息，優雅的進入/退出，表情符號和GIF分享，具有鼓舞人心和有趣的界面。
localize.tagline: 向Google Meet添加表情符號/GIF、議程、客人信息等
